title: Fallen
description: The third erotic novella of Driftwood Cove.After fleeing a disastrous affair in the Mexican Riviera, Linda St. John vows to never let herself fall in love again. She abandons the voyeuristic trappings of her secret pleasures club and finds a quiet new home in the seaside hills of Driftwood Cove for her self-imposed exile. When Jacob and his motorcycle roar back into her life seeking the affections she once denied him, Linda tests her resolve to enjoy the young man's sexual passions while remaining detached from the love he so desperately wants. It is a bold venture that blinds her from the terrifying secret that Jacob has been keeping from Linda since she abandoned him in Puerto Vallarta.A story of secrets and lies, Fallen races from innocent flirtation to devious climax.
author: E.C. Towers
